# text

**Instance Property**

The text inside a search or text field.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute String text;
```

## Discussion

Use this attribute to set or get the text in a `searchField` or `textField` element.

## Setting and Retrieving Text

- **onTextChange**: A function the system calls when the text in a search or text field changes.
